二時: (ふたとき) - fairly long period of time; four-hour period

二枚鑑札: (にまいかんさつ) - {sumo} holding two positions at once (esp. of rikishi or judges who are also coaches)
二桁: (ふたけた) - two-digit number; "tens" column; two digits; double figures

二業地: (にぎょうち) - entertainment quarters (food and geisha)

二様: (によう) - two ways (e.g. of interpreting a word); two kinds; two types

二次冷却水: (にじれいきゃくすい) - secondary cooling water (esp. in a pressurized water reactor)
二次創作: (にじそうさく) - derivative work (e.g. alt. world, side story, doujinshi, fanfiction, etc.); derived work

二次記憶装置: (にじきおくそうち) - secondary storage
